Chapter 1, Part 2: The Adornments of the Wonderful Leaders of the Worlds
At that time, the ocean-like assembly at the TathÄgata's site of enlightenment had all gathered like clouds;
The various kinds were all around, filling everywhere;
The forms and retinues were each different;
They approached the World-Honored One from the directions they came and single-mindedly gazed up at him.
This assembly had already been free from all afflictions, mental defilements, and their remaining habits, and had destroyed the heavy mountain of hindrances, seeing the Buddha without obstruction.
In this way, it was all because of the practices of the bodhisattva carried out by Vairocana TathÄgata in the past, for many eons, using the four means of magnetizing to have once magnetized them;

At each buddha's place, when planting roots of goodness, he had already well employed various skillful means to teach and transform them, bringing them to maturity and causing them to establish the path to omniscience;
They planted innumerable wholesome roots and attained great blessings, all of which had already entered the ocean of skillful means and vows;
The practices they engaged in were completely pure;
On the path of liberation, they were already able to emerge well;
They always saw the Buddha, clearly illuminating;
With the power of supreme understanding, they entered the ocean of the TathÄgata's merits and attained the liberation gate of spiritual powers of the buddhas.
Namely:
The great sovereign heavenly king of the ocean of wondrous flames attained the liberation gate of the power of tranquil skillful means in the dharma realm and the realm of space;
The heavenly king of sovereign renown and light attained the liberation gate of universally observing all dharmas and being sovereign over them;
The heavenly king of pure meritorious eyes attained the liberation gate of knowing that all dharmas are unborn, unceasing, non-coming, non-going, and without purposeful activity;
The heavenly king of supremely delightful great wisdom attained the liberation gate of the ocean of wisdom that directly perceives the true characteristics of all dharmas;
King of the Heaven of Freedom from Corruption, obtained the liberation door of great skillful means of bestowing boundless peace and happiness to sentient beings;
King of the Heaven of Wonderful Adornments, obtained the liberation door of causing the observation of tranquil dharmas to extinguish the fears of delusion and darkness;
King of the Heaven of Good Contemplation, obtained the liberation door of skillfully entering boundless realms without giving rise to any thoughts of existence;
King of the Heaven of Great Wisdom, obtained the liberation door of going to the ten directions to expound the Dharma without moving or relying on anything;
King of the Heaven of Universal Sound Adorned Banner, obtained the liberation door of entering the Buddha's tranquil realm and universally manifesting light;
King of the Heaven of Good Effort, obtained the liberation door of abiding in one's own realization and taking the boundless vast realm as the object.
The Buddha's body pervades all great assemblies, filling the Dharma realm without end,
Tranquil and extinct, without nature, ungraspable, appearing to save the world.
The TathÄgata, the Dharma King, appears in the world, able to light the wonderful Dharma lamp illuminating the world,
The realm boundless and endless, realized by this sovereign name.
The Buddha is inconceivable, free from discrimination, understanding the marks of the ten directions as nonexistent,
Extensively opening the pure path for the world, the pure eye can observe this.
The TathÄgata's wisdom has no bounds, all worlds cannot fathom it,
Forever extinguishing the deluded minds of sentient beings, great wisdom enters this and abides deeply.
The TathÄgata's merits are inconceivable, those who see him have their afflictions extinguished,
Universally causing the world to attain peace and joy, the sovereign god Aká¹£obhya can see this.
Sentient beings are always deluded and covered in darkness, the TathÄgata teaches them the tranquil Dharma,
This is the lamp of wisdom that illuminates the world, the wondrous eye can know this skillful means.
The TathÄgata's pure and wondrous form body universally manifests in the ten directions without compare,
This body has no nature and no basis, it is observed by the Heaven of Good Thought.
The TathÄgata's voice is unlimited and unobstructed, all those who are receptive to transformation hear it,
Yet the Buddha is always still and unmoving, this is the liberation of the Heaven of Delightful Wisdom.
The lord of the heavens and humans of tranquil liberation is present everywhere in the ten directions,
The radiance illuminates and fills the world, this is seen by the one with unobstructed Dharma banners.
The Buddha, for the sake of sentient beings, sought enlightenment for boundless great eons,
Using various spiritual powers to transform all, this truth is realized by the Heaven of Renowned Light.
Next, the Heaven King of the Banner of Light of Delightful Dharma attained the liberation door of observing the faculties of all sentient beings and speaking the Dharma to eliminate their doubts;
The Heaven King of Pure Adorned Ocean attained the liberation door of causing one to see the Buddha upon recollection;
The Heaven King of Supreme Wisdom and Light attained the liberation door of the adornments of the body, equal in the nature of dharmas, with nothing to rely on;
The Heaven King of Sovereign Wisdom and Banner attained the liberation door of the ocean of inconceivable adornments, established in a single thought of all worldly dharmas;
The Heaven King of Joyful Tranquility attained the liberation door of unobstructed manifestation of inconceivable buddha-lands in a single pore;
The Heaven King of Universal Wisdom Eyes attained the liberation door of entering the universal gate and observing the dharma realm;
The Heaven King of Joyful Revolving Wisdom attained the liberation door of always appearing before all sentient beings for boundless eons, appearing in various ways;
The king of the heaven of the light of the wisdom of good seeds attained the liberation gate of observing all worldly realms and entering the inconceivable Dharma;
The king of the heaven of stainless tranquil light attained the liberation gate of revealing the essential methods for all sentient beings to escape from suffering;
The king of the heaven of vast pure light attained the liberation gate of observing all sentient beings to be transformed and causing them to enter the Buddha Dharma.

At that time, the king of the heaven of delightful Dharma light and banner, empowered by the Buddha, universally observed the assemblies of the heaven of slight light, the heaven of immeasurable light, and the heaven of vast fruits, and spoke a verse, saying:
The Buddha's realm is inconceivable, all sentient beings cannot fathom it,
Causing their minds to give rise to faith and understanding, the vast aspiration is inexhaustible.
If there are sentient beings able to receive the Dharma, the Buddha's majestic spiritual power opens and guides them,
Causing them to always see the Buddha present before them, the king of the ocean of adornments sees it in this way.
The nature of all dharmas has no basis, and the Buddha appears in the world in the same way.
Universally in all existences, there is no basis to rely on, and this supreme meaning can be observed with wisdom.
According to the desires in the minds of sentient beings, the Buddha's spiritual powers can manifest them all.
Each is different and inconceivable, which is the liberation ocean of Wisdom Banner King.
All the lands of the past are manifested in a single pore,
which is the great spiritual power of the buddhas, and Joyful Peace can proclaim it.
The inexhaustible ocean of all Dharma gates gathers together in a single Dharma site.
The Buddha has explained that the nature of dharmas is like this, and the wisdom eye can clarify this skillful means.
All the lands in the ten directions are all within them, and the Dharma is expounded.
The Buddha's body has no coming or going, which is the realm of the revolving wisdom of Joyful Wisdom.
The Buddha observes worldly dharmas like light and shadows, and enters their profound and obscure places.
He explains that the nature of all dharmas is always quiescent; Good Seed Contemplation can see this.
The Buddha is well aware of all objects; following the faculties of sentient beings, he rains down the Dharma rain.
He opens the inconceivable door to liberation; this Silent Heaven can understand and enter.
The World-Honored One always appears with great kindness and compassion, benefiting sentient beings.
Equally raining down the Dharma rain, filling their vessels; Pure Light Heaven can expound this.
Furthermore, the Heavenly King of Pure Wisdom and Renown attained the liberation door of skillful means to understand the liberation path of all sentient beings;
The Heavenly King of Supreme Vision attained the liberation door of universally manifesting like light and shadows in accordance with the desires of the heavenly multitudes;
The Heavenly King of Peaceful Virtues attained the liberation door of great skillful means to universally purify all Buddha-realms;
Sumeru Sound King Heaven, attained the liberation door of following all sentient beings' eternal flow through the ocean of birth and death;
Pure Mindfulness Eye King Heaven, attained the liberation door of recollecting the TathÄgata's practice of taming sentient beings;
Delightful Universal Illumination King Heaven, attained the liberation door flowing out from the ocean of dhÄraá¹‡Ä«s with universal approaches;
Worldly Sovereign King Heaven, attained the liberation door of the treasury of enabling sentient beings to encounter the Buddha and give rise to faith;
Blazing Light Sovereign King Heaven, attained the liberation door of enabling all sentient beings to hear the Dharma, give rise to faith and joy, and attain liberation;
Delighting in Contemplating Dharma Transformation King Heaven, attained the liberation door of entering the boundless and inexhaustible space-like bodhisattva practices of taming;
Transformation Banner King Heaven, attained the liberation door of universal compassion and wisdom observing sentient beings' immeasurable afflictions;
Star Sound Wonderful Adornment King Heaven, attained the liberation door of emitting light and manifesting Buddhas' three wheels of attracting and transforming.

At that time, the Heavenly King Pure Wisdom and Renown, receiving the Buddha's majestic power, universally observed the assemblies of the Heaven of Lesser Purity, Heaven of Immeasurable Purity, and Heaven of Universal Purity, and spoke a verse, saying:
The one who understands the nature of dharmas without obstruction universally manifests in the innumerable lands of the ten directions,
expounding the inconceivable Buddha realm, causing the multitudes to return together to the ocean of liberation.
The TathÄgata abides in the world without relying on anything, like a shadow or a reflection appearing in the lands,
the ultimate nature of dharmas is without arising, this is the entrance of the victorious King of Insight.
Cultivating skillful means for innumerable eons, universally purifying the lands of the ten directions,
the dharma realm is as it is, always unmoving, this is realized by the Heavenly One of Tranquil Virtue.
Sentient beings are covered by the obstructions of foolishness, blind and dark, always dwelling in birth and death,
the TathÄgata shows them the pure path, this is the liberation of Sumeru Sound.
The unsurpassed path practiced by all buddhas cannot be fathomed by any sentient being,
Yet they demonstrate various expedient means, which Pure Eyes, contemplating in truth, can fully understand.
The TathÄgata always uses the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« gates, as numerous as the dust motes in a buddha-land,
To teach sentient beings everywhere, which Universal Light, the king of gods, is able to enter.
The TathÄgata's appearance in the world is extremely difficult to encounter, only met with once in the ocean of innumerable eons,
Causing sentient beings to give rise to faith and understanding, which is attained by this sovereign god.
The Buddha teaches that the nature of dharmas is all without nature, profound, vast, and inconceivable,
Universally causing sentient beings to give rise to pure faith, which Flaming Light, the king of gods, is well able to understand.
The merit and virtue of the tathÄgatas of the three times is replete, transforming the inconceivable realm of sentient beings,
Contemplating this and giving rise to joy, such is the one who delights in the Dharma and is able to expound it.
Sentient beings are drowning in the ocean of afflictions, with the turbidity of ignorance and views extremely frightening,
The Great Teacher takes pity and causes them to be forever free from this - this is the realm observed by the King of Transformation Banners.
The TathÄgata always emits great light, with innumerable Buddhas in each light,
Each manifesting activities to transform sentient beings - this is the entrance realized by the Heavenly Son of Wonderful Sound.
Next, the Heavenly King of Lovely and Joyful Light attained the liberation door of always experiencing tranquil bliss while being able to manifest and eliminate the suffering of the world;
The Heavenly King of Pure and Wonderful Light attained the liberation door of the treasury of great compassion and the bliss of all sentient beings;
The Heavenly King of Sovereignty and Sound attained the liberation door of manifesting the power of the blessings and virtues of all sentient beings in boundless eons in a single thought;
The Heavenly King of Supreme Mindfulness and Wisdom attained the liberation door of purifying all worlds of formation, abiding, and destruction, making them all like empty space;
The Heaven King of Lovely and Pure Sounds attained the liberation door of loving and joyfully accepting the Dharma of all sages;
The Heaven King of Good Contemplation Sounds attained the liberation door of being able to expound the meaning and methods of all grounds for eons;
The Heaven King of Expounding Adorned Sounds attained the liberation door of skillful means of making great offerings when all bodhisattvas descend from Tuá¹£ita Heaven;
The Heaven King of Profound Light Sounds attained the liberation door of observing the inexhaustible ocean of spiritual powers and wisdom;

At that time, the Heaven King of Lovely Light, empowered by the Buddha, surveyed the entire assembly of lesser light gods, immeasurable light gods, and extreme light gods, and spoke in verse, saying:
I recall the practices of the Tathagata in the past, serving and making offerings to boundless Buddhas,
in accordance with the pure karma of his original faith, now I see all this through the Buddha's spiritual power.
The Buddha's body is formless and free from defilements, always abiding in the ground of compassion and pity,
causing all the worries and sufferings of the world to be eliminated, this is the liberation of Wonderful Light.
The Buddha's Dharma is vast and boundless, with oceans of lands appearing within it,
according to their formation and destruction, each being different, this is the liberating power of the Heavenly Sovereign of Sovereignty.
The Buddha's spiritual powers are unequaled, universally manifesting vast lands in the ten directions,
causing them all to be pure and always present, this is the skillful means of the liberation of supreme mindfulness.
As numerous as the dust motes in oceans of lands, all the Tathagatas are respectfully served,

The Buddha, in the ocean of immeasurable great kalpas, speaks of the expedient means of the stages, unequaled by others,
What he speaks is boundless and endless, and the celestial being Good Thought Sound knows this meaning.
The TathÄgata's supernatural powers have immeasurable gates, manifesting everywhere in a single thought,
Descending to be born and attaining the Way, with great skillful means, this is the liberation of the celestial being Adorned Sound.
Able to expound by the power of authority, and manifesting the supernatural powers of all buddhas,
In accordance with their faculties and desires, causing them all to be purified, this is the liberation gate of the celestial being Light Sound.
The TathÄgata's wisdom has no bounds, unequaled in the world, and nothing to which it clings,
With a mind of kindness, responding to beings and universally manifesting before them, the celestial being Vastly Renowned awakens to this path.
The Buddha, in the past, cultivating the practices for attaining enlightenment, made offerings to all buddhas in the ten directions,
In each and every buddha's presence, giving rise to the vow mind, Most Excellent Light hears this with great joy.
Next, the Brahma King Shiqi attained the liberation gate of pure conduct without attachment and spoke the Dharma in the enlightenment sites in all directions;

At that time, the Great Brahma King Åšikhin, receiving the Buddha's spiritual power, universally observed the Brahma Body gods, Brahma Attendant gods, Brahma Assembly gods, and Great Brahma gods, and spoke a verse, saying:

Next, the king of the Heaven of Freedom attained the liberation door of the treasury of freedom in manifesting and maturing immeasurable sentient beings;
The king of the Heaven of Good Eyes attained the liberation door of observing all sentient beings' joys and causing them to enter the bliss of the holy realm;

At that time, the Deva King of Freedom, receiving the Buddha's majestic spiritual power, looked over the entire assembly of freedom devas and spoke a verse, saying:
The Buddha's body pervades equally the Dharma realm, universally responding to sentient beings and appearing before them all,
With various teachings always guiding and transforming, they are able to enlighten and awaken with mastery over the Dharma.

In the great ocean of immeasurable and boundless kalpas, manifesting in the ten directions and expounding the Dharma,
One has never seen the Buddha come or go. This is realized by Lord Light Heaven.
Next, the Heavenly King of Good Transformation attained the liberation gate of revealing the power of transformation of all karmas;
King of the Heaven of Pure Abode, obtained the liberation door of the light of the ocean of all merits and virtues of the TathÄgata.

King of the Heaven of Universal Purity, obtained the liberation door of the light of the ocean of all merits and virtues of the TathÄgata.

At that time, the heavenly king SuyÄma, empowered by the Buddha's spiritual power, universally observed the entire assembly of SuyÄma gods and spoke a verse, saying:

Various contemplations of the Buddha as nonexistent, sought in the ten directions but unobtainable,

The space of the ten directions can be measured, but the measure of a pore of the Buddha cannot be obtained,
Such unobstructed inconceivability, already able to be understood by the Wonderful Crown King.
The Buddha, in the immeasurable eons of the past, fully cultivated the vast perfections,
Diligent in practice, without weariness or sloth, Joyful Wisdom is able to know this Dharma door.
The nature and causes of karma are inconceivable, the Buddha expounds them all for the world,
The nature of dharmas is originally pure, without any defilements - this is the place where Flower Light enters.
You should contemplate a single pore of the Buddha, in which all sentient beings are contained,
They neither come nor go - this is understood by Universal Vision King.
Next, the Heaven King of Contentment attained the liberation door of the perfect teaching wheel of all Buddhas appearing in the world;

The Heaven King Good Eyes attained the liberation door of universally purifying the realms of all sentient beings;
The Heaven King Jewel Peak Moon attained the liberation door of the inexhaustible treasury of universally transforming the world and always being present;

The king of vajra-adorned light devas attained the liberation door of solidifying the bodhi mind of all sentient beings and making it indestructible;
The king of star banner devas attained the liberation door of all buddhas appearing and personally observing and taming sentient beings with skillful means;
The king of wondrous adornment devas attained the liberation door of knowing the minds of sentient beings in a single thought and responding to their capacities.

The TathÄgata cultivated various practices in the past, with pure great vows as deep as the ocean,
causing all Buddha-dharmas to be fulfilled, which the superior virtue one can understand this skillful means.
The TathÄgata's Dharma body is inconceivable, like a shadow dividing forms and being equal to the Dharma realm,
expounding all dharmas everywhere, which is the liberation door of the tranquil light deva.
Sentient beings are bound and covered by karmic afflictions, with arrogant and indulgent minds running wild,
the TathÄgata expounds the Dharma of tranquility for them, which the well-eyed one illuminates and understands with a joyful mind.

universally showing sentient beings the place of peace and happiness, which Peak Moon is able to deeply enter.
The inconceivable Buddha-realm pervades all Dharma realms,
Entering into all dharmas, reaching the other shore, the courageous wisdom sees this and gives rise to joy.
If there are sentient beings who are suitable to receive transformation, hearing the Buddha's merits, they head towards enlightenment,
Causing them to abide in the ocean of blessings, always pure, Wonderful Light is able to observe this.
The number of dust motes in the ocean of lands in the ten directions, all going to gather before all Buddhas,
Respectfully making offerings and listening to the Dharma, this is seen by Wonderful Adornment Banner.
The ocean of sentient beings' minds is inconceivable, without abiding, without movement, without a basis,
The Buddha clearly sees them all in a single thought, Wonderful Adornment Heaven thoroughly understands this.
Furthermore, the Heavenly King of the Time Division attained the liberation door of arousing all sentient beings' wholesome roots and causing them to forever abandon worries and distress;
The Heavenly King of Wonderful Light attained the liberation door of universally entering all realms;
The Heavenly King of Infinite Wisdom and Meritorious Banner attained the liberation door of the great compassion wheel that eliminates all afflictions;

The Heavenly King of Great Light of DhÄraá¹‡Ä«s attained the liberation door of the light of dhÄraá¹‡Ä«s that remembers all dharmas without forgetting;

At that time, the Heavenly King of the Time Division, receiving the Buddha's majestic power, universally observed the entire assembly of the Time Division Heaven's multitudes and spoke a verse, saying:

Widely opening the dust-free and pure path, forever illuminating the wisdom lamp for sentient beings.
The TathÄgata's Dharma body is extremely vast, the limits of the ten directions cannot be obtained,
All skillful means are limitless, the wisdom of the Heaven of Wonderful Light can enter.

The Great Teacher compassionately vows to eliminate them all, the wisdom light of the inexhaustible mind can awaken to this.
The Buddha's illusory wisdom is unobstructed, clearly penetrating the dharmas of the three times,
